text: Alfredo Carbonell Debali was a Uruguayan lawyer and diplomat. In the decade of 1930 he was chargé d'affaires at the Uruguayan embassy in Bern. In July 1938 he took part at the Évian Conference. Later, in 1947, he was appointed Ambassador to the Holy See. ==References== Category:Uruguayan people of Catalan descent Category:Uruguayan people of Hungarian descent Category:Uruguayan lawyers Category:Uruguayan diplomats Category:Ambassadors of Uruguay to the Holy See
title: Alfredo Carbonell Debali
